data.text: @bitchystarlight LOL, the one BP movie that I found him attractive. It was totally his character. All other times, BP leaves me cold. I remember when majority folks started getting hot for him with Thelma & Louise.
@bonobochick A movie poster. From Lwgends of the Fall

@bitchystarlight Was it a movie poster or a model poster? He doesn't really do anything for me... truthfully it is still a 3 Chris race for me but I find his Jurassic World character sexy/appealing, so it confuses the race for me at times. https://t.co/9ksevD4kjb
@bonobochick My sister used to have a poster of him in her room & ever since I’ve found him less attractive than others seem to find him.
